description.value:
Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows.

An ally that recovers Hit Points from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lay on Hands] gains a +1 status bonus to their saving throws until the end of their next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Resilient Touch]
